books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: The unforgettable novel of a childhood in a sleepy Southern town and the crisis of conscience that rocked it.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale by English writer George Orwell.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: The story of the mysteriously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: The story of the Bennet family and their five unmarried daughters.

books.title: The Book Thief
books.author: Markus Zusak
books.description: This the story of how a young girl in Nazi Germany who loves books and isn't afraid to steal them.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A teenage boy who has been expelled from his prep school and is wandering through New York City over a few days in 1947.

books.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.description: A young man who purchases eternal youth at the expense of his soul.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A hobbit who embarks on an adventure to win a share of the treasure guarded by Smaug the dragon.

favorites.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
favorites.author: Oscar Wilde
favorites.description: A young man who purchases eternal youth at the expense of his soul.
